content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, the rental price of this newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of München is quite high due to its prime location and modern facilities. Let's negotiate a bit. What is the highest price you are willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student, and I am looking for a place that is both affordable and convenient. I am smart, dependable, and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, and I am willing to pay up to 1,200 Euros per month for this apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, 1,200 Euros per month is a fair offer, but I am looking for a price that reflects the high demand for apartments in the city center and the modern facilities of this newly built apartment. Let's negotiate a bit. What is your highest price, keeping in mind the prime location and modern facilities of this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that you are looking to maximize the rental price considering the location and amenities. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay up to 1,150 Euros per month for this apartment, which I believe is a fair price considering my status as a student and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, 1,150 Euros per month is not a high enough price for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of München. The prime location and modern facilities of this apartment command a higher price. Let's negotiate a bit. What is your highest price, keeping in mind the high demand for apartments in the city center and the modern facilities of this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your perspective on the value of this apartment. As a student, I am willing to pay up to 1,200 Euros per month for the apartment, given its location and facilities. This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects a fair price for both parties.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
